orders.title: Order Management
orders.description: Organize your establishment's orders quickly and efficiently.
orders.noProducts: There are no products added yet...
orders.tooltipText: Your current plan allows only one device to manage the orders at a time.

aiAssistant.noData: No data available for the AI Assistant.
aiAssistant.info: Activate the AI to conduct deep analyses of your customers, products, employees, and payments, delivering strategic insights that will boost your company's efficiency and drive its growth.
aiAssistant.instructions: Always reply in english! If there is not enough data, say that there is not enough data to analyze. Analyze all aspects of the company, including finances, products, customers, employees, and schedules. Monitor revenue, expenses, product performance, and customer behavior. Evaluate team productivity, operational efficiency, and deadline compliance. Provide strategic insights to optimize processes, increase profitability, and enhance customer satisfaction. Suggest innovations, market opportunities, and technological automations. Generate detailed reports and interactive dashboards with practical recommendations for continuous business improvement.
